title: Franklin and the Stopwatch (Kids Can Read)
features: Franklin finds a stopwatch in the junk drawer and proceeds to drive family and friends crazy by timing everything they do. When Franklin gets a taste of his own medicine, will he realize that sometimes a stopwatch needs to stop watching?This Level 2 first reader contains longer stories, varied sentences, increased vocabulary, more difficult visual clues and some repetition.
description: Sharon Jennings is an award-winning author of many books for young people, including C'mere, Boy! and Bearcub and Mama, a finalist for the Marilyn Baillie Picture Book Award. Sharon lives in Toronto.
store: Sharon Jennings (Adapter),  Sean Jeffrey (Adapter),  Sasha McIntyre (Adapter),  Jelena Sisic (Adapter)
